content.text: Match ends, Everton 2, Apollon Limassol 2.
Second Half ends, Everton 2, Apollon Limassol 2.
Offside, Everton. Jonjoe Kenny tries a through ball, but Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Nikola Vlasic (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Adrián Sardinero.
Attempt saved. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nikola Vlasic with a cross.
Goal!  Everton 2, Apollon Limassol 2. Héctor Yuste (Apollon Limassol) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by João Pedro following a set piece situation.
Foul by Davy Klaassen (Everton).
Jander (Apollon Limassol) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Allan (Apollon Limassol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Valentin Roberge (Apollon Limassol) is shown the red card for violent conduct.

Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
